data.name: Astraphobia
entries: You must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw whenever you start your turn in a storm, see a storm from a distance, or hear a storm from a distance. On a failed save, you are {@condition Frightened} of the storm. As an action, you can repeat the saving throw, ending the condition on a success. If you succeed, you automatically succeed on saves against Astraphobia for the next hour.

data.name: Megalophobia
entries: You must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw whenever you start your turn within 300 feet of a Huge or greater sized creature that you can see or when you see a Colossal or greater sized creature from a distance greater than that. On a failed save, you are {@condition Frightened} of that creature. As an action, you can repeat the saving throw, ending the condition on a success. If you succeed, you automatically succeed on saves against Megalophobia for the next hour.

data.name: Merinthophobia
entries: You must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw whenever you start your turn {@condition Grappled} or {@condition Restrained}. On a failed save, you are {@condition Frightened} of the source of the condition. As an action, you can repeat the saving throw, ending the condition on a success. If you succeed, you automatically succeed on saves against Merinthophobia for the next hour.

data.name: Panphobia
entries: You must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw whenever you start your turn. On a failed save, you are {@condition Frightened} of everything. As an Action, you can repeat the saving throw, ending the condition on a success. If you succeed, you automatically succeed on saves against Panphobia for the next hour.
